metadata.title: CVE-2020-15668 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
A lock was missing when accessing a data structure and importingcertificate information into the trust database. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 80 and Firefox for Android < 80.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15668` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
